reviews.review:
Short but sweet. Portal, Portal 2 and The Witness are the best puzzle games I've ever played.

☐ 01/10 - Literally unplayable.
☐ 02/10 - Why does this even exist.
☐ 03/10 - Don't waste your time.
☐ 04/10 - Forgettable.
☐ 05/10 - Mediocre.
☐ 06/10 - Serviceable. Fulfills its purpose.
☐ 07/10 - Good. Worth checking out if you like the genre.
☐ 08/10 - Recommended. Some flaws hold it back from greatness.
☐ 09/10 - Among the best the genre has to offer.
☑ 10/10 - Essential. Transcends its genre and you should play it.
This game is awesome for the puzzle solvers out there. the story line is intriguing and the dialogue is hilarious

You can never go wrong with science!
even after all of these years it is still one of me favorite games of all time.

Cringe as GLaDOS tries tricks and traps to  drive your character insane ,
 then creates a meme that will drive YOU insane.
Un buen juego pero muy corto.

PORTAL

You awake in a testing chamber with a monotone motherly-sounding voice giving you instructions. Then a portal opens up and you step through. You're a test subject at the Aperture Science Laboratories, and you job is to test... until you are no longer needed.

One of the best puzzle solving games I've played, ever. It still stands up pretty well today. Highly recommended.

10/10
Ha envejecido de buena manera, después de tantos años lo probé, y realmente me gustó.

i bought this game like 3 times

um  jogo para passar  o tempo mas fixe

玩过一遍可能就不想再玩了。

that radio be all like BUHRM BUHDUBAPUHDAH BUHDURMBUH PUHDUH BUHDADUH

pretty good game kinda perfect in every way 
10/10

Played through the whole campaign in one sitting in about 4 hours (I got REALLY stumped on a few puzzles) so it isn't a long game but it is really fun to play. The puzzles start out easy and get harder as you go along, and I felt really smart when I got some of them quickly, lol. GLaDos is an amazing character and I will definitely be playing Portal 2 after this, since I think that game must go into the back story and lore much more than this one does, unless this one has more of that in the bonus maps/whatever else.

This game is a classic, and if you even kind of like puzzle games, you'll like this. I only kind of like puzzle games and I loved it. Also, the song during the credits is just fantastic.

Portal es un juego muy original, con mecanica nuevas para su epoca. Tiene unos graficos muy bueno para la epoca en que se creo y el tiempo no le a caido mal. La villana GLADOS es muy remorable y muy interesante, 10/10

странная игра если честно, немного похожа на портал 2 так что скорее всего плагеат!!! а за плагиет можно и в глаз дать!!! ребят некрасиво!! советую разроботчекам развить своё воображение и придумать собсвтвенаю концепцаю!!! а всем остальным рекамендую паиграть в портал 2 и поддержать разработчекав новоторав!!! всем спасибо маи фанаты ждите новых обзора они будат скора надо только падаждать!!!
This is such a good game, totally worth buying it. The end surprises me, I didn't expect it to be like that.
It was perfect to play with people who know what they're doing : )
Extremely original, just buy it's super cheap
Крутая игра, но старая уже как я
One of the best games EVER
is good but must be clever so if not clever the NO

Ein echt klasse Spiel, besonders auch wie die Engine programmiert wurde.
Zudem ist das mit den Portalen wirklich gut gemacht und es gibt immer eine neue Herausforderung!
ЭТо портал 1? Лол, Я думал вторая часть)

ABSOLUTELY LOVED THIS GAME! 
I have never in my whole damn life played another game that has challenged me as much as this game has. The story, the suspense and the sheer creepiness and eeriness that this game manages to achieve, in spite of the fact that the player is the only alive thing in the ENTIRE game, is what makes this game so very very beautiful and special. EASILY ONE OF THE GREATEST GAMES I'VE EVER PLAYED!!!

Сюжет: Пускай это и называют техно-бэткой. Но сюжет интересный. Пускай и такой лёгкий, и не запутанный. Но простой и понятный. Он мне приглянулся, и при первом прохождении, мне было интересно что будет дальше. Короче за сюжет плюс.

Геймплей: Нечего сказать, просто ВО. Замечательная головоломка.

Jogo muito bom, da pra perder muitas horas nele mas o 2 é ainda melhor.
Minha nota pra esse jogo é 8. :D
第二部我一定要找个损友一起玩。
AMAZING and FUN and TOTALLY worth it
haha the cake is a lie XD

-Played it 6 years ago and thought "meh, it's not THAT great."
-Fast forward to 2020, when I decided give it another shot for the "quick" 15 achievements. 
-After 100%, it's now one of my favorites.
portel open, and you go to diferent plac
Demasiado entretenido, y tenes que pensar mucho en los desafíos, la verdad excelente juego, recomendadísimo.

A very clever game idea which starts off pretty easy, but gets progressively harder to nearly impossible (for me anyway) attractive graphics and the gameplay is easy to master, just the puzzles are hard. Loved it, will start Portal 2 soon.
Buenos puzzles y con historia lineal, entretiene un buen rato
It's a nice chill game, and once you solve the puzzles you'll feel like a genius
It was fun and I’m glad I played it

Jak widać grałem  w nią tylko 4 godziny i już ją skończyłem.
Ale mimo to, bez dwóch zdań mogę stwierdzić, że na swoje czasy (nawet na 2020) to prawie arcydzieło (oczywiście każdy ma swoje zdanie). 
Postaram się streścić co mi się podobało bez spoilerów:
+fizyka
+aspekty psychologiczne
+atmosfera (nieziemska)
+fabuła (mimo to, że ciekawa, trochę mało rozwinięta)
+zagadki logiczne
+grafika (na swoje czasy całkiem, całkiem)
+optymalizacja
+sposób przedstawienia fabuły
Co mi się nie podobało:
-glitche (bugi)
-trochę za krótka (ale tylko trochę :) )
W skali procentowej grze "Portal" wystawiam ocenę 97%.
Bawiłem się niesamowicie, na zakończeniu czułem się... 
Właściwie trudno to opisać.
Czułem coś w stylu: "TO CAŁY CZAS BYŁO TUTAJ?!"
Kolokwialnie mówiąc mózg mi eksplodował.
Pozdro dla tych którzy też są w 6 klasie i to czytają xD
명겜인건 알고 있었는데 겜자타임으로 안하던 겜 . 3d 멀미가 약간 나지만 충분히 감수하고 꼭 해봐야하는 게임
Un juego adictivo y con muchos secretos que oculta en realidad portal es un juego que tiene historia y tiene el alma de half life.

I've always wanted to play Portal 2 but decided to start with the first one in order to understand the story better and I'm pretty sure I did the right choice.
This game is amazing to think out of the box and, even though it is quick to finish, I really enjoyed the puzzles and the overall storytelling. Plus, Glados is an amazing ennemy to have haha.
The game crashed a few times on me, but luckily it makes automatic quick saves. However, I wonder why it crashed so suddenly. Apart from this, I don't really this any bad point to this game. 
It's an old, but gold classic.

Eu não sei o que falar sobre uma obra de arte tão incrível, esse jogo é simplesmente sensacional, o início é bem lentinho, mas com o decorrer das fases, ele vai ficando mais difícil e interessante, até chegar ao final, que é a parte mais interessante do jogo!
I love that thereès no glitches
